description_for_model: Provides unified access to OpenAI-compatible endpoints: /v1/responses, /v1/chat/completions, /v1/tools, /v1/files, /v1/vector_stores, and /v1/realtime. Includes built-in tools for code execution, file operations, image and video generation, and vector retrieval.
